DOC.brief_summary: This study examines the mechanisms, including brain imaging of placebo analgesia
DOC.brief_title: Brain Imaging and Pain in Irritable Bowel Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Irritable Bowel Syndrome English speaking Exclusion criteria: Chronic pain condition other than Irritable Bowel Syndrome Medical condition that would contraindicate use of lidocaine Clinical criteria for fibromyalgia Presence of systemic disease such as diabetes, thyroid, gastrointestinal or liver disease, collagen vascular disease, malignancy, focal or neurological Seropositive HIV Pregnancy
